title: Alternative Medicine - Spiritual Science Research Foundation
description: Comparison of various forms of alternative medicine shows that they have different levels of intensity and effectiveness
cleaned_text: Until recently, the Western medical world looked upon Allopathy as the primary therapy for any illness. Today there is a growing trend of using a variety of alternative therapies like Yunani medicine, Acupressure, Homeopathy, yurvda, etc. However, a comparative study of the alternative therapies has not been clearly documented. We have made a comparative study of a few alternative therapies to give our readers some insight into how they work and the level at which they effect healing. This information is actually Divine Knowledge received by seekers of SSRF with a highly developed and advanced [sixth sense or extra-sensory perception (ESP)](https://www.spiritualresearchfoundation.org/spiritualresearch/spiritualscience/sixthsense). The accuracy of the knowledge has been checked by [His Holiness Dr. Athavale](https://www.spiritualresearchfoundation.org/spiritualresearch/spritualscience/sainthood/subtle-picture-hh-jayant-athavale).
